body.name: Runner Rug 2x8, Washable Hallway Runner Rugs, Non-Slip Low-Pile Soft Kitchen Rug Runner Laundry Room Rug, Vintage Throw Entry Foyer Mat for Entrance Living Room (Navy Blue, 2 x 8)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Anti Slip Backing Rug: Our indoor entryway rug is designed with non skid backing,, which can firmly grip the ground. It is suitable for placing in high-traffic areas without worrying about slipping. Also protects your floors from stains and scratches. Low pile design is ideal for any area in your home and will not obstruct doorways. Perfect for busy home with kids and pets.

Easy To Maintain And Clean: This retro low-pile floor carpet can be vacuumed or used for daily cleaning with a broom and burlap to keep dust and debris out of the fibers, or a washing machine for deeper cleaning. This hallway floor mat features premium fiber locking technology that has been machine tested many times and proven to withstand frequent machine washes without warping, shedding, and without fading.

Functional Runner Rug: 2x8 Rug Runner Liven Up Or Complement Your Decor And Fine Floors In The Foyer Or Entryway, Back Door, Living Room, Dining Room, Kitchen, In Front Of The Fireplace, Hallways, And Will Not Obstruct Doorways. The long runner for hallway is also ideal as a gift for your friends, parents, kids and family.

Foldable Long Runner Rug：Foldable hallway runner rug make it easier to store away and save space for extra storage. Tips: Roll the rug in the opposite direction and lay it flat for a while. Creases typically flatten out within 1-2 weeks of unrolling.

Fit Right in: This long runner rug is a very classic vintage yet modern style, which complements many different types of furniture. A delightful and stunning addition to your home. With a range of colours and styles available, find your perfect fit with Madane to make every room a place you love to be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This rug is really pretty and SO comfortable, it’s soft almost like a plush velvet!The bottom has non-slip grip on it so you don’t need any additional pads underneath. I was excited when purchasing to learn that it’s machine washable, our previous runner was becoming too much work to take it to be professionally cleaned from time to time. This will save time and money for sure!When I first unboxed it the rug had creases from being folded, but those flattened out within a few hours without me needing to steam it or anything. It lays out beautifully.I messaged the seller with questions and they responded quickly and very kindly, so I look forward to giving them my business again in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and light weight
reviews.reviewText: This is so freaking cute! I got the pink one and it feels great! It’s not thick so you can still open any doors you need! Price wasn’t bad either!! I’m getting a bigger one in another color for my living room!! 10/10 recommend!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this rug to put in front of the kitchen sink area. It fits perfectly and looks really nice, but I wish it had more brown than gray. It looks more brownish in the description pictures, which is what I wanted. I have attached a couple of my own pictures so you can see what I mean. But it still works fine with my kitchen colors and it’s really soft. I did add a 1/4” pad underneath, however. The most important part of this rug is that it’s washable, seeing as it’s in the kitchen and near the sink and stove. Just by looking at it and feeling it I’m somewhat skeptical how well it washes and if the colors/design stays on. But other reviewers have said it washes just fine, so I’m hoping that’s the case! I’ll update my review if things go amiss in the wash!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars An overall good rug for the price
reviews.reviewText: This rug is a good rug for the cost of it. It comes folded, so beware of that. You have to unfold it and lay it out. (There are some perpetual folds along the edges, as a result.) The colors are nice, and the rug is very soft—even after multiple washings. The rug did shrink a small amount after the first washing, and thus lays a little differently than at first, but it still looks great. I have washed the rug twice now, and it is so easy to just pop it into the washer’ despite it being a 10’ rug, it is thin enough to fit easily into the machine. I am pleased with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am pleasantly surprised.
reviews.reviewText: This was a great purchase. I don't write too many reviews, but i felt compelled to write about these runners. I didn't have high hopes for quality, but these far exceeded my expectations. The material is super soft on these rugs. The colors are true to the pics. I wish they were a little bit wider, but thats my only personal choice. They are truly great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These rugs are fantastic!
reviews.reviewText: These rugs are nice, I really liked the way they lay flat and have nonslip backing. They are very soft and have many colors to choose from. Great value for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Washable, looks beautiful and is so high quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love
reviews.reviewText: I used this as a runner for my bathroom. It is unbelievably soft! It is thin and seems to stick well to floor. It did come with some creases, but I think a couple days will flatten it out. The print is beautiful— I’m very pleased! My 2 x 7 took 2 1/2 weeks to come in the mail, which was a disappointment.
